description.en: Unlike the real mammal, this one is surely alive and ready to conquer the deepest mines with its tusks! This one sailed a frozen sea to reach your room, so keep it warm and healthy! By Andando

description.en: Polite on the surface, brutal underneath — this miner blends calm calculation with merciless efficiency. One moment it’s steeping in silence, the next it’s tearing through blocks like a proper blockchain barbarian.

description.en: Towering across the crypto battlefield, this beast stomps through blocks with mechanical precision and unstoppable rhythm. Built like an AT-AT but driven by hunger for profit, it’s a walking force of ham-fueled domination—slow, steady, and absolutely relentless.

description.en: Meet the 'Bearish Miner', the only crypto miner that hibernates through bear markets but wakes up to mine with the ferocious power of a polar bear to earn in the bull run!
description.cn: Meet the 'Bearish Miner', the only crypto miner that hibernates through bear markets but wakes up to mine with the ferocious power of a polar bear to earn in the bull run!

description.en: Shrouded in the chill of the northern winds, the Frost Drakkar sails with a fury that freezes the sea in its wake. Its power is relentless, a testament to the warriors who follow its path, securing riches from the coldest corners of the world
